On 2/13/07, David Saff <saff@...> wrote:
>
>   All,
>
> I'm happy to announce that Popper 0.1 has been released. Popper
> enables developers to specify and validate general statements about
> program behavior, called Theories. For downloads, a tutorial, and a
> link to our paper about how Theories can augment test-driven
> development, please see
>
> http://tigris.popper.org
>
> Please give feedback on the list, personally to me, or in the issue
> tracker. Thanks,
>
> David Saff
>  
>
